Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.1: Make content knowledge accessible to students in all content areas including language arts, science, math, social sciences, and the arts.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.2: Design, deliver, and assess effective instruction.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.3: Create and maintain a respectful, productive classroom learning environment.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.5: Teach in consideration of student development, diversity, and special needs.
